title: SL delegation leave for USA for IMF discussion
body_lines: A delegation including Finance Minister Ali Sabry, Central Bank Governor Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe and Finance Ministry Secretary Mahinda Siriwardene left the country this morning to participate in discussions with the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
Accordingly, they will hold discussions at IMF headquarters in Washington DC, USA.
If the IMF talks succeed, Sri Lanka will receive close to US $ 4 billion.
